title: You Can Turn Off Political Posts On Facebook | Deuce | 98ROCK
text:
You Can Turn Off Political Posts On Facebook posted by Deuce - share 
Remember when Facebook used to be full of pictures of relationships, kids, food, and kittens? When we were tired of people telling us their every move, those were the glory days. Well looks like now there is way to take Facebook back from the crazy, rude political posts. 
Watch video and turn off the political posts. It asked for a short biography,... Well I am short, but I prefer to call it "Fun Size" I love to rock, the water, collect vinyl, and give Ty a hard time. Be sure to follow my Facebook page, Twitter, and keep an eye out for #DeepThoughtsWithDeuce. Catch Mandatory Metallica each week night at 6pm. ROCK ON! Contact
